heading: HR01593
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON ALL MARINE SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH IN PHILIPPINE WATERS CONDUCTED BY FOREIGN ENTITIES WITH OR WITHOUT THE CONSENT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, WITH AN END VIEW OF CHARTING APPROPRIATE MECHANISMS TO MONITOR COMPLIANCE OF FOREIGN ENTITIES ON REQUIREMENTS DEMANDED BY THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS since 2018-02-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01593
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON ALL MARINE SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH IN PHILIPPINE WATERS CONDUCTED BY FOREIGN ENTITIES WITH OR WITHOUT THE CONSENT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, WITH AN END VIEW OF CHARTING APPROPRIATE MECHANISMS TO MONITOR COMPLIANCE OF FOREIGN ENTITIES ON REQUIREMENTS DEMANDED BY THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS ON 2018-02-07
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-01-23;
